files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ActionResultExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods to convert Result types to ASP.NET Core ActionResult responses. These methods bridge Railway Oriented Programming with ASP.NET Core MVC/Web API controllers.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ActionResultExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Provides asynchronous extension methods to convert Task/ValueTask-wrapped Result types to ASP.NET Core ActionResult responses. These methods enable clean async/await patterns in controllers while maintaining Railway Oriented Programming benefits.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Aggregate<TId>
files.Summary: Base class for aggregate roots in Domain-Driven Design. An aggregate is a cluster of domain objects (entities and value objects) that form a consistency boundary. The aggregate root is the only entry point for modifications and ensures all invariants within the boundary are maintained.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.AggregateError
files.Summary: Represents an aggregate of multiple errors that occurred together. Use this when multiple independent errors need to be returned as a single failure result.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Asp.ModelBinding.MaybeModelBinder<TValue, TPrimitive>
files.Summary: Model binder for parameters where TValue implements . Binds optional route, query, form, and header parameters to .

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Asp.ModelBinding.ScalarValueModelBinder<TValue, TPrimitive>
files.Summary: Model binder for scalar value types. Validates scalar values during model binding by calling TryCreate.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Asp.ModelBinding.ScalarValueModelBinderProvider
files.Summary: Detects scalar value types and wrapping scalar value types, and provides model binders for them.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Asp.Validation.MaybeScalarValueJsonConverter<TValue, TPrimitive>
files.Summary: A JSON converter for properties where TValue implements .

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Asp.Validation.MaybeScalarValueJsonConverterFactory
files.Summary: Factory for creating instances for properties where T implements .

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Asp.Validation.ValidatingJsonConverter<TValue, TPrimitive>
files.Summary: A JSON converter for value objects that implement . This converter collects validation errors instead of throwing exceptions, enabling comprehensive validation error responses.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Asp.Validation.ValidatingJsonConverterFactory
files.Summary: Factory for creating validating JSON converters for types.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.BadRequestError
files.Summary: Represents a bad request error indicating the request was malformed or syntactically invalid. Use this for requests that cannot be processed due to syntax errors, missing required data, or malformed content. Maps to HTTP 400 Bad Request.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.BindExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for binding (chaining) operations over Result values.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.BindExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Provides asynchronous extension methods for binding (chaining) operations over Result values.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.CombineErrorExtensions
files.Summary: Combine errors into one. If both the errors types are , the validation errors will be merged. Otherwise, the errors will be wrapped into an .

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.CombineExtensions
files.Summary: Combines two or more into one tuple containing all the Results.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.CombineExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Combines two or more into one tuple containing all the Results.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ConflictError
files.Summary: Represents a conflict error indicating the request conflicts with the current state of the resource. Use this when an operation cannot be completed due to a conflict with existing data or state. Maps to HTTP 409 Conflict.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.DomainError
files.Summary: Represents a domain or business rule violation. Use this for errors that occur when domain logic or business rules prevent an operation from completing. Maps to HTTP 422 Unprocessable Entity.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.EnsureExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for ensuring conditions on Result values. If conditions fail, the result is converted to a failure with the specified error.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.EnsureExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Async Ensure extensions where BOTH input and predicates are async (Task).

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Entity<TId>
files.Summary: Base class for entities in Domain-Driven Design. An entity is a domain object defined by its identity rather than its attributes. Two entities with different attributes but the same ID are considered equal.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Error
files.Summary: Base class for all error types in the functional DDD library. Errors represent failure states and contain structured information about what went wrong.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.FluentValidationResultExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods to integrate FluentValidation with Railway Oriented Programming Result types. Enables seamless conversion of FluentValidation results to Result<T> for functional error handling.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ForbiddenError
files.Summary: Represents a forbidden error when an authenticated user lacks permission to access a resource. Use this when the user is authenticated but does not have the required authorization or role. Maps to HTTP 403 Forbidden.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.HttpResponseExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for handling HTTP response messages with Result and Maybe monads.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.HttpResultExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods to convert Result types to ASP.NET Core Minimal API responses. These methods bridge Railway Oriented Programming with ASP.NET Core Minimal APIs.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.HttpResultExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Provides asynchronous extension methods to convert Task/ValueTask-wrapped Result types to ASP.NET Core Minimal API responses. These methods enable clean async patterns in Minimal API endpoints while maintaining Railway Oriented Programming benefits.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.IAggregate
files.Summary: Defines the contract for an aggregate root in Domain-Driven Design. An aggregate is a cluster of domain objects that can be treated as a single unit for data changes.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.IDomainEvent
files.Summary: Represents a domain event - a record of something significant that happened in the business domain. Domain events capture state changes and business occurrences that domain experts care about.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.IResult<TValue>
files.Summary: Generic interface for result types, providing typed access to the success value.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.IResult
files.Summary: Non-generic base interface for result types, exposing success/failure state and error information.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.IScalarValue<TSelf, TPrimitive>
files.Summary: Interface for scalar value objects that can be created with validation. Enables automatic ASP.NET Core model binding and JSON serialization.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MapExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for mapping (transforming) values inside Result objects.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MapExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Provides asynchronous extension methods for mapping (transforming) values inside Result objects.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MapOnFailureExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for transforming errors in failed Results while leaving successful Results unchanged.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MatchErrorExtensions
files.Summary: Pattern matching helpers for discriminating specific error types in Result. Allows matching on specific error types (ValidationError, NotFoundError, etc.) rather than treating all errors the same.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MatchErrorExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Asynchronous pattern matching helpers for discriminating specific error types in Result.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MatchExtensions
files.Summary: Pattern matching helpers (Match / Switch) for Result.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MatchExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Asynchronous pattern matching helpers for Result.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Maybe<T>
files.Summary: Represents domain-level optionality â€” a value that was either provided or intentionally omitted. Unlike (value types only) or T? (annotation only for reference types), is a real generic type that works uniformly with both value and reference types and composes with pipelines.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Maybe
files.Summary: Contains static methods to create a object.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MaybeExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for converting instances to objects and for wrapping values in a .

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.MaybeExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Provides asynchronous extension methods for converting instances to .

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.NotFoundError
files.Summary: Represents a "not found" error when a requested resource does not exist. Use this when an entity, record, or resource cannot be located. Maps to HTTP 404 Not Found.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.NullableExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for converting nullable values to Result types. Provides a convenient way to handle null checking with Railway Oriented Programming.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.NullableExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Asynchronous extension methods for converting nullable values to Result types.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PartialObjectResult
files.Summary: Represents an that returns HTTP 206 Partial Content with a Content-Range header. Used to indicate that the response contains a subset of the requested resource.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.Age
files.Summary: Age value object with validation for ages 0-150.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.CountryCode
files.Summary: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code value object.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.CurrencyCode
files.Summary: Represents an ISO 4217 currency code as a value object.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.EmailAddress
files.Summary: Represents an email address value object with RFC 5322-compliant validation. Ensures that email addresses are syntactically valid and prevents invalid email data in the domain model.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.Hostname
files.Summary: RFC 1123 compliant hostname value object.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.IpAddress
files.Summary: Represents an IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) as a value object.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.LanguageCode
files.Summary: ISO 639-1 language code value object.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.Money
files.Summary: Represents a monetary amount with a currency code. Provides type-safe arithmetic operations that prevent mixing different currencies.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.MoneyJsonConverter
files.Summary: JSON converter for Money value objects. Serializes Money as {"amount": 99.99, "currency": "USD"}.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.ParsableJsonConverter<T>
files.Summary: A JSON converter for value objects that implement . Enables automatic serialization and deserialization of parsable value objects in ASP.NET Core APIs and System.Text.Json scenarios.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.Percentage
files.Summary: Represents a percentage value object (value between 0 and 100 inclusive). Ensures that percentage values are within the valid range for percentage calculations.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.PhoneNumber
files.Summary: Represents a phone number value object with E.164 format validation. Ensures that phone numbers follow international standards for telephony.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.PrimitiveValueObjectTrace
files.Summary: Provides OpenTelemetry activity tracing for Primitive Value Objects operations. Enables monitoring and diagnostics of value object creation, validation, and parsing activities.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.PrimitiveValueObjectTraceProviderBuilderExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for configuring OpenTelemetry tracing for Primitive Value Objects (PVO).

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.RequiredDecimal<TSelf>
files.Summary: Base class for creating strongly-typed decimal value objects that cannot have the default (zero) value. Provides a foundation for monetary amounts, percentages, and other domain concepts represented by decimals.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.RequiredEnum<TSelf>
files.Summary: Base class for creating strongly-typed, behavior-rich enumeration value objects. Enum value objects are a DDD pattern that replaces C# enums with full-featured classes.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.RequiredEnumJsonConverter<TRequiredEnum>
files.Summary: JSON converter for types. Serializes to the string Name and deserializes from string name.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.RequiredGuid<TSelf>
files.Summary: Base class for creating strongly-typed GUID value objects that cannot have the default (empty) GUID value. Provides a foundation for entity identifiers and other domain concepts represented by GUIDs.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.RequiredInt<TSelf>
files.Summary: Base class for creating strongly-typed integer value objects that cannot have the default (zero) value. Provides a foundation for entity identifiers, counts, and other domain concepts represented by integers.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.RequiredString<TSelf>
files.Summary: Base class for creating strongly-typed string value objects that cannot be null or empty. Provides a foundation for domain primitives like names, descriptions, codes, and other textual concepts.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.Slug
files.Summary: URL-safe slug value object (lowercase letters, digits, single hyphens).

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.PrimitiveValueObjects.Url
files.Summary: Represents a URL value object with format validation. Ensures that URLs are valid and well-formed for web and API scenarios.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.RailwayOrientedProgrammingTraceProviderBuilderExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for configuring OpenTelemetry tracing for Railway Oriented Programming operations.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.RailwayTrackAttribute
files.Summary: Indicates which railway track an operation executes on. This metadata can be used by IDE extensions, analyzers, and documentation generators.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.RateLimitError
files.Summary: Represents a rate limiting error when too many requests have been made. Use this when a client has exceeded their request quota or rate limit. Maps to HTTP 429 Too Many Requests.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.RecoverOnFailureExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for recovering from failed results by executing fallback operations.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.RecoverOnFailureExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Provides asynchronous extension methods for recovering from failed results.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Result<TValue>
files.Summary: Represents either a successful computation (with a value) or a failure (with an ).

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Result
files.Summary: Static Combine methods for combining multiple independent Result values without chaining.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ResultDebugExtensions
files.Summary: Debug extension methods for inspecting Result values during development. These methods execute only in DEBUG builds and become no-ops in RELEASE builds (with zero overhead).

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ResultDebugExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Debug-only async extension methods for inspecting Result values during development. These methods are only available in DEBUG builds and are automatically excluded from RELEASE builds. Debug information is written to dedicated Activity spans for OpenTelemetry compatibility.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ResultLinqExtensions
files.Summary: Provides LINQ query expression support for Result types, enabling C# query syntax for functional operations.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ScalarValueObject<TSelf, T>
files.Summary: Base class for value objects that wrap a single scalar value. Provides a strongly-typed wrapper around primitive types with domain semantics.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ScalarValueValidationEndpointFilter
files.Summary: An endpoint filter that checks for scalar value validation errors collected during JSON deserialization. For Minimal APIs, this filter returns validation problem results when validation errors are detected.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ScalarValueValidationFilter
files.Summary: An action filter that checks for validation errors collected during JSON deserialization and validates route/query parameters. Returns a 400 Bad Request response with validation problem details when validation fails.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ScalarValueValidationMiddleware
files.Summary: Middleware that creates a validation error collection scope for each request. This enables ValidatingJsonConverter to collect validation errors across the entire request deserialization process.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ServiceCollectionExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for configuring automatic value object validation in ASP.NET Core.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ServiceUnavailableError
files.Summary: Represents a temporary service unavailability error. Use this when the service is temporarily unable to handle the request due to maintenance or overload. Maps to HTTP 503 Service Unavailable.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.TapExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for executing side effects on successful Results without changing the Result.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.TapExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Provides asynchronous extension methods for executing side effects on successful Results without changing the Result.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.TapOnFailureExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for executing side effects on failed Results without changing the Result.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.TapOnFailureExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Provides asynchronous extension methods for executing side effects on failed Results without changing the Result.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.TrackBehavior
files.Summary: Defines which railway track an operation runs on in Railway-Oriented Programming.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.TraverseExtensions
files.Summary: Transforms a collection of items into a Result containing a collection, short-circuiting on the first failure. Useful for processing collections where each item can fail independently.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.UnauthorizedError
files.Summary: Represents an authorization error when authentication is required but not provided. Use this when a user is not authenticated (not logged in) and must authenticate to access the resource. Maps to HTTP 401 Unauthorized.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.UnexpectedError
files.Summary: Represents an unexpected system error or exception. Use this for infrastructure failures, unhandled exceptions, or system-level errors. Maps to HTTP 500 Internal Server Error.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.Unit
files.Summary: Represents the absence of a meaningful value, used for operations that have no return value. This is the functional programming equivalent of void, but as a proper type that can be used with generics.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ValidationError.FieldError
files.Summary: Represents an error for a specific field, which may have multiple detail messages.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ValidationError
files.Summary: Represents validation errors for one or more fields. Used when input data fails business rules or constraints.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ValidationErrorsContext
files.Summary: Provides a context for collecting validation errors during JSON deserialization. Uses AsyncLocal to maintain thread-safe, request-scoped error collection.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.ValueObject
files.Summary: Base class for value objects in Domain-Driven Design. A value object represents a descriptive aspect of the domain with no conceptual identity. Value objects are immutable, defined by their attributes, and support structural equality.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.WhenExtensions
files.Summary: Conditionally executes an operation based on a predicate, maintaining the railway. Useful for executing operations only when certain conditions are met without breaking the Result chain.

files.Title: FunctionalDdd.WhenExtensionsAsync
files.Summary: Asynchronous conditional execution operations for Result.
